place_brief_desc: Turkey's capital and largest city, known for its Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and Grand Bazaar.
place_longer_desc: Istanbul is a vibrant city with a lot to offer visitors. The Hagia Sophia is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most popular tourist attractions in Turkey. Visitors can also visit the Blue Mosque, one of the largest mosques in the world, and the Grand Bazaar, one of the largest and oldest covered markets in the world. Istanbul is also a great place to enjoy Turkish cuisine and culture.
